formulas.description: Approver based on ARR Discount DOA 2025
formulas.name: ApproverARRDiscount
formulas.expression: IF( ({!Get_DOA_Record.Discount_ARR__c} <= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.MRR_Discount_Sales_Rep__c}), "Not Required", IF( ({!Get_DOA_Record.Discount_ARR__c} <= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.MRR_Discount_Sales_Manager__c}), "Sales Manager", IF( ({!Get_DOA_Record.Discount_ARR__c} <= 0.5), "CRO", IF( {!Get_DOA_Record.Discount_ARR__c} > 0.5, "CFO + CEO", "Not Required" ) ) ) )

formulas.description: Approver if billing candence is more frequent than annually
formulas.name: ApproverBillingCadence

formulas.description: approver for deviation from SMB special deal
formulas.name: ApproverDeviationSMBSpecialDeal

formulas.description: approver in case discount has been extending past the initial term
formulas.name: ApproverDiscountExtendingPastTerm
formulas.expression: IF ( ( {!Get_DOA_Record.Discount_extending_past_the_initial_term__c} = TRUE && ISPICKVAL({!Get_Opportunity_0.Account.Company_Size_New__c}, 'SMB') ), 'CFO + CEO', ( IF ( ({!Get_DOA_Record.Discount_extending_past_the_initial_term__c} = TRUE && ISPICKVAL({!Get_Opportunity_0.Type}, 'New Business-Enterprise Cloud')), 'CFO', 'Not required') ))

formulas.description: approver for discount on unbundled remaining SKUs
formulas.name: ApproverDiscountUnbundledSKUs
formulas.expression: IF(({!Get_DOA_Record.Discount_on_unbundled_remaining_SKUs__c} = TRUE && ISPICKVAL({!Get_Opportunity_0.Type}, ' New Business-Enterprise Cloud')), 'CFO', 'Not Required')

formulas.name: ApproverOneOffDiscount
formulas.expression: IF( ({!Get_DOA_Record.Discount_One_Off__c} <= 0.15), "Not Required", IF( ({!Get_DOA_Record.Discount_One_Off__c} <= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.One_off_Discount_VP_of_CS__c}), "Sales Manager", IF( ({!Get_DOA_Record.Discount_One_Off__c} <= 0.5), "CRO", IF( {!Get_DOA_Record.Discount_One_Off__c} > 0.5, "CFO + CEO", "Not Required" ) ) ) )

formulas.description: Approver if payment term is > 60 days
formulas.name: ApproverPaymentTerm

formulas.description: Approver in case project does not start by the end of the next month
formulas.name: ApproverProjectStartDate

formulas.description: Calculates what ARR is + 25% of ARR. This is used to check for step up deals if ACV> Y1 ARR by 25% or more. (ACV > New Biz Opp ARR * 1.25) THIS IS NEW FOR DOA 25
formulas.name: CheckOriginalOpptyARRStepUp25

formulas.description: Calculates what ARR is + 50% of ARR. This is used to check for step up deals if if last Y ARR > Y1 ARR by 50% or more. (Sum of ARR of all the Opps > New Biz Opp ARR * 1.5) THIS IS USED FOR DOA 25
formulas.name: CheckOriginalOpptyARRStepUp50

formulas.description: Formula to represent ARR before discount (Sum of Default Price x Quantity of OLIs)
formulas.name: CURRENCY_ARR_Before_Discount
DATE_Date_of_NOW_in_GMT
formulas.expression: DATE( VALUE( MID( TEXT(NOW()), 1, 4)), VALUE( MID( TEXT(NOW()), 6, 2)), VALUE( MID( TEXT(NOW()), 9, 2)) )

formulas.description: Total ACV for the step up deal (original new business opportunity + related upsell opportunities) USED FOR DOA 25
formulas.name: SUMACVStepUp

formulas.description: Calculates the sum of ARR for the Step up Deal (original new business opportunity + related upsell opportunities) USED FOR DOA 25
formulas.name: SumARRStepUp

formulas.description: Formula field to return DoA Approval Status to be set on Opp and DoA record. Either "Not Required" or "Pending".
formulas.name: TEXT_DoA_Approval_Status

formulas.description: Formula to extract only Product Name from Name of OLI (Opportunity Name + Producut Name)
formulas.name: TEXT_OLI_Product_Name

recordLookups.description:
Get the opportunity line items to check if there are any products which are part of a package which have been removed (quantity < 0)
OLI records found means discount on unbundled remaining SKUs
recordLookups.name: Check_discount_on_unbundled_remaining_SKUs
recordLookups.label: Check discount on unbundled remaining SKUs

recordLookups.description: Check to see if there is any recurring discount.
recordLookups.name: Check_for_recurring_discount
recordLookups.label: Check for recurring discount

recordLookups.description: Checks if the New Business opportunity is part of a step up deal. Step up deals are a combination of opportunity records of Type New Business and Upsell. The Upsell opportunity has a link to the New Business opportunity in the Related Primary Deal field.
recordLookups.name: Check_for_step_up_deal
recordLookups.label: Check for step up deal

recordLookups.name: Get_DOA_Record
recordLookups.label: Get DOA Record for formula fields

recordLookups.description: Check if there are upsell opportunity products with discount
recordLookups.name: Get_upsell_opportunity_products_with_discount
recordLookups.label: Get upsell (step up) opportunity products with discount

recordUpdates.name: Update_Opp_to_clear_DoA_Approval_Status
recordUpdates.label: Update Opp to clear DoA Approval Status

screens.description: Final screen in case of approval not required
screens.name: Complete_Not_Required
screens.label: Complete: Not Required

fields.name: TEXT_Completed_Not_Required
fields.fieldText:
Approval is not required for this Opportunity.

Now the prices and terms have been fixed and you can move forward to next stages.

screens.description: Screen to confirm before triggering the approval process
screens.name: Confirm_to_submit_approval_process
screens.label: Confirm to submit approval process

fields.name: CONFIRM_Submit_approval
fields.fieldText:
Screen needs to be updated with new fields & scenarios!


Approval is required from the following approver(s).



ARR Discount: %

One-off Discount: %

Special Billing Scenario: {!Get_Opportunity_0.Special_Billing_Scenario__c}

Invoice Period: {!RGet_Opportunity_0.Invoice_period__c} months

Payment Period: {!Get_Opportunity_0.Payment_Period__c}


Indexation Waived: {!Get_Opportunity_0.Waive_Indexation__c}

Contract Term: {!Get_Opportunity_0.Netsuite_Term__c}


ARR before discount: {!Get_Opportunity_0.CurrencyIsoCode}

(* excl. products with negative quantity)

﻿

Tick below checkbox to submit the approval request.


You can also leave comments to explain why discounts/special payment terms are given.

screens.description: Confirm the user to trigger the DoA process.
screens.name: Confirm_to_submit_DoA_process
screens.label: Confirm to submit DoA process

fields.name: TEXT_Confirm_to_submit_DoA_process
fields.fieldText:
In order to proceed to Legal Review or later stage, you need to finalize the prices and terms.

In case DoA approval is required, you cannot edit the record until the process is accepted/rejected/recalled.

Once finalized, you cannot edit the prices and terms (Products, Invoice Period, Payment Period).


Tick below checkbox to fix the prices and terms.

screens.description: DoA Approval Request has been submitted and is pending for approval.
screens.name: DoA_Approval_Pending
screens.label: DoA Approval Pending

fields.name: TEXT_Approval_Pending
fields.fieldText:
DoA Approval Request has been submitted and is awaiting for approval.

If you need to cancel the approval request and update the Opportunity,

recall the approval process in the Approval History section.

fields.name: ErrorInfo
fields.fieldText: Indexation information is not filled on the account. Please contact the legal team.

fields.name: PriceUpliftMissingError
fields.fieldText: Price Uplift on Renewal value on opportunity is not matching with the account. Please update before submitting for DOA approval.

screens.name: Pricing_factors_are_not_applied_yet
screens.label: Pricing factors are not applied yet

fields.name: PricingNotApplied
fields.fieldText: Pricing factors are not applied yet, Please apply by clicking on 'Apply Pricing Factors' button and retry the DOA process.

screens.description: Reset DoA Approval Status if needed
screens.name: Reset_DoA_Approval_Status
screens.label: Reset DoA Approval Status

fields.name: TEXT_Confirm_Reset_DoA_Approval_Status
fields.fieldText:
The prices and terms has been already finalized and fixed.

Do you want to unlock the prices and terms?

(If you unlock, then you will need to launch this process again.)


Tick below checkbox if you want to unlock.

fields.name: approverstest
fields.fieldText:
Approvers:


ARR Discount: {!ApproverARRDiscount}

Billing Cadence: {!ApproverBillingCadence}

SMB Special Deal: {!ApproverDeviationSMBSpecialDeal}

Discount extending: {!ApproverDiscountExtendingPastTerm}Discount unbundled: {!ApproverDiscountUnbundledSKUs}

One Off Discount: {!ApproverOneOffDiscount}

Payment term: {!ApproverPaymentTerm}

Project Start date: {!ApproverProjectStartDate}Short term contract: {!ApproverShortContractTerm}Step up:{!ApproverStepUp}

fields.name: stepupformularecord
fields.fieldText:
step up deal info get record for formula

Check Original Oppty ARR Step Up 25: {!CheckOriginalOpptyARRStepUp25}

Ceck Original Oppty ARR Step Up 50: {!CheckOriginalOpptyARRStepUp50}

SUM ACV Step Up: {!SUMACVStepUp}

Sum ARR Ste[ Up: {!SumARRStepUp}


Transfrom elements:

Total ACV Upsell{!Get_total_ACV_of_releated_upsell_opportunities}

Total ARR upsell

{!Get_total_ARR_of_related_upsell_opportunities}

IDs:

{!Collect_all_Upsell_Step_Up_Deal_Record_IDs}

transforms.description: Collect all upsell step up deal records to us in the get opportunty products with discount
transforms.name: Collect_all_Upsell_Step_Up_Deal_Record_IDs
transforms.label: Collect all Upsell Step Up Deal Record IDs

transforms.description: get total ACV across the related upsell opportunities - this amount still needs to be added to the original new business opportunity
transforms.name: Get_total_ACV_of_releated_upsell_opportunities
transforms.label: Get total ACV of releated upsell opportunities

transforms.description: Get the total ARR of all the related upsell opportunities
transforms.name: Get_total_ARR_of_related_upsell_opportunities
transforms.label: Get total ARR of related upsell opportunities

variables.description: Variable to store the sum of Total Price of One-off products. One-off products in a package are excluded.
variables.name: CURRENCY_Sum_of_One_off_Total_Price

variables.description: Variable to store the sum of Default Price x Quantity of MRR products. Only includes OLIs with positive quantity.
variables.name: CURRENCY_Sum_of_Positive_MRR_Default_Total_Price

variables.description: Variable to store the sum of Total Price of MRR products. Only includes OLIs with positive quantity.
variables.name: CURRENCY_Sum_of_Positive_MRR_Total_Price

variables.name: TEXT_Line_Break
